discourse_list.title: DGOV 2018 - distributed governance conference in Athens (7-9.12.2018.)

content.content: Hi all, we are proposing for Fellowship to support the upcoming DGOV 2018 - the first conference on distributed governance. We hope to present it to you at Berlin Council. DGOV 2018 will provide a meeting point for the distributed consensus technologists, policy-makers, academics and practitioners to learn and share experience in self-organised organisations. It is a forum for interdisciplinary debate on the most pressing problems the world confronts nowadays and on problem solving capacity that new digital technologies offer. Check it out: Intro blog post: https://medium.com/@dgov.earth/introducing-dgov-2018-11f961fe7919 Website: https://dgov.earth Public telegram group: t.me/dgov18 Reddit: /r/dgov Twitter: @dgovearth Reach out for details: tomislav.mamic.st@gmail.com or @Timotheus tim.bansemer@inblock.io
